availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel A. Miller (Olmsted County, Minnesota, pvt 2nd MN Inf, lieut and captain 1st KY Lt Art USA)

body.p: Olmsted County, Minnesota, soldier. Ohio native. Son of Lewis Miller and Susan Miller. Student in Wayne County, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer with Lewis Miller in Olmsted County, Minnesota, in 1860. Served in the 2nd Minnesota Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private from March 6, 1862, to January 1, 1864. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery Regiment (U.S.A.) as second lieutenant, lieutenant, and captain from January 2, 1864, to August 1, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Wayne County, Sugar Creek, p. 58B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Minnesota, Olmsted County, Cascade, p. 777.
Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Minnesota, Olmsted County, Rochester Ward 3, Enumeration District 0118, p. 7.
Index to Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From the State of Minnesota, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M546, Roll 0006.
Minnesota Civil War Muster Rolls, Muster Roll of 2nd Minnesota Volunteer Infantry Regiment (St. Paul, MN: Minnesota Historical Society), p. 21, 601 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0149.
Find A Grave, "Capt Samuel A Miller (1840-1928)," Memorial #134529125, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/134529125 (accessed January 7, 2021).
